website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for both Quest Bar fans and those who are new to the brand and want to try an assortment of the many delicious flavors the company has to offer.
pros: A pack of 36 bars with a variety of popular flavors, including fruit bars and chocolate bars
Bars are conveniently packaged in three boxes containing 12 each
cons: A few reports of boxes with close expiration dates or bars that were mashed or stuck to their wrappers

customer_reviews.title: Great bars for the purpose - quick snack - not a meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great bars! Just be sure you check the expiration and keep them in a moderately cool place. They can easily get weirdly out of shape and oily if left in a place where it's too warm. A lot of feedback says this isn't a meal replacement, but the fact is that it all depends on what you do with them and how you use them. You may not be a big eater and these are just fine. I eat these for breakfast every morning, just to get something in my stomach. The small, but filling meal (bar) allows me to each a nice bigger (healthy) meal for lunch. Putting my calories and meal sizes where I want them.
customer_reviews.author: Checkoutnow

customer_reviews.title: ... for a while now and by far it's the best protein bar out on the market today
customer_reviews.text: We've been ordering Quest Nutrition Bars for a while now and by far it's the best protein bar out on the market today. The variety pack is the best deal ever knowing that we can try different flavors on a daily basis. I think the only downfall is that there are new flavors that are out, but for some reason, we're only given the following options of flavors when we order through Amazon. Hopefully, one day, it can be switched up. For the most part, these protein bars are one of the best, if not, the only best out on the market. Thank you for providing us a safe and nutritional protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Vibeone2002

customer_reviews.title: The best protein bars on the market...
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing protein bars. With the macros they have, I was skeptical about how they would taste, but these taste are the best tasting protein bars on the market. The chunks of fruit/chocolate/etc are incredible, and it seems like each of my friends, family, and co-workers that tries one ends up purchasing a box or ten. Anyone from children to adults love the taste as they don't have the typical chalky taste. For an even better taste be sure to warm them up a few seconds in the microwave. Thank me later!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Inventive!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and inventive! There is a wide range of flavors and choices that I get to choose from every morning before and after workouts! The only flavor that I do not care for is the lemon one. It kind of tastes the way lemon pledge smells. Every other one is amazing! Especially the cinnamon roll one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Provide good nutritional value.
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars are part of my diet because they provide a good portion of the nutrition that I seek. It is odd that they have so many flavors as they all mostly taste the same to me. If they are not a gourmet's choice, I don't care as long as they provide the nutrition that I need.
customer_reviews.author: JAGWAR

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bars you can buy
customer_reviews.text: 20g of protein and 190 calories and 18g of fiber on average per bar. These are truly the best protein bars you can buy. The ingredient list is short but the flavors are good. The only one I don't like is the lemon bar one but there's only 3 of them in the box. The bars are shipped loose in the shipping box which is kind of funny.
customer_reviews.author: TheRollingPanda

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite protein bars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite protein bars, and I'm probably on my 5th order. They're fantastic for breakfast or for a small snack when I'm doing protein shakes as meal replacements. The flavors are really good and actually taste just like what they say they are. For example, the PB&J bar is just as satisfying as eating an actual PB&J sandwich. I plan to keep ordering these bars!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I have Secondary Progressive MS and find it difficult to feed myself (I don't have the energy to cook). These solve my problem and are healthy and packed with protein. And, amazingly, the flavors actually taste very close to what they advertise. I expected less. I got more.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weir

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pack
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a variety of flavors so I knew which ones I would like and would want to get more of next time. Minor detail, but the bars all stuck to the inside of the foil wrapper, so I had to tear down the length of the wrapper to peel the bar out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN VAN ZANDT

customer_reviews.title: Poor product near expiration
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product several times over the past year and it is not cheap. For the second time I received the Quest bars with many close to the expiration date. The quality of the bars received is very poor - as if they melted and then harded again - I have not been able to chew several of them and have had to throw them out. One or more "leaked' in the box creating a greasy feel to the outside of many of the remaining bars. Very dissatisfied and will look for another vendor or buy at GNC.
customer_reviews.author: khd

customer_reviews.title: Great entry into Quest bars
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to get a taste of Quest bars this is a good way to start. You can sample most of the flavors to figure out which one you like best. ***The cookies and cream flavor is not included in the multi pack and IMO they are the best tasting ones***
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Quest bars!
customer_reviews.text: I love Quest protein bars! Some flavors are better than others, but I love the variety and taste of most of them, plus the ingredients are usually healthier than many bars out there.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good variety but wrappers were tightly stuck to the bars which makes me think they were somewhat older stock .
customer_reviews.author: ppk49

customer_reviews.title: High protein and ingredients I can pronounce
customer_reviews.text: Love Quest bars! These are by far my favorite protein bars. It seems it's impossible to find a high protein bar that's also not loaded with crap, but they do it well with these.
customer_reviews.author: Glitch

customer_reviews.title: The Best Protein Bars Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The variety pack lets you decide which flavor you like best for future purchases. These are the best protein bars on the market today!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: One of the best protein brands out there
customer_reviews.text: One of the best protein brands out there. Worth the price! I definitely think the chocolate flavors are the best.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was nice and fast
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was nice and fast. It was also fun to open the box to see all the varieties. It looks like you'll be getting three boxes of just three flavors at first, but that's not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of flavors and good value
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of flavors and good value. Sometimes they're a bit too dry before I finish the whole box, but I've never found them unappetizing. Easy to toss in gym bag or office desk.
customer_reviews.author: Dr DK

customer_reviews.title: Finally a protein bar that's easy on my stomach
customer_reviews.text: The flavors are as amazing and best of all, these bars don't mess with my GI like most protein bars. Cinnamon Bun flavor.......GTFO.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dame

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. The bars were properly put I place and protected with minor distortions. They all seem fresh instead of hard and stale. The products match the description perefrctly!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavors!
customer_reviews.text: All of my favorite flavors! Well packaged, fresh, and speedy arrival! In my humble opinion, the best protein bar on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Hubcatz

customer_reviews.title: All of the flavors are really good! This is the one protein bar recommended by ...
customer_reviews.text: All of the flavors are really good! This is the one protein bar recommended by my personal trainer/nutritionist for being absolute top-quality. She does, however, steer me towards the flavors that use Stevia and avoids those with sucralose.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for building and when you cant get to eat a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Goukid7

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was beyond excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of Protein bars - none come close to Quest Bars. Customer service was beyond excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: SW Michigan Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! $2 is the cheapest I can find ...
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! $2 is the cheapest I can find these bars anywhere - coupled with free prime shipping, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Bars Yet
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite protein bars. Worth the money. Best tasting, low sugar and carbs,etc. Love em
customer_reviews.author: Joe L.

customer_reviews.title: Will order again. Wish this was on the the ...
customer_reviews.text: Will order again. Wish this was on the the subscribe list.
customer_reviews.author: John Willimon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: These taste very good and are very high in protein, much more than most protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: cathy p

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars, they taste good and are filling. My order was on time and exactly what I wanted. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Stacey A

customer_reviews.title: Not bad! Not quite the love affair
customer_reviews.text: Not bad! Not quite the love affair, but better than most bars that are full of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: this doesn't matter at all because these are some of the best protein bars you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the bars will come in crazy packaging every time you order them. Yes, sometimes the bars get a little smashed. Really though, this doesn't matter at all because these are some of the best protein bars you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good variety.
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars, they taste good and have low calories. I like the wide variety.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Gadgets!

customer_reviews.title: Great no carb/no sugar snack
customer_reviews.text: Great no carb/no sugar snack. Taste great . . . not like something made by Dow Chemical like so many other bars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best "Total Solution" Protein Bar on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and great to be able to get it in a variety pack and at a reasonable cost. Would definitely order again. No better protein bar on the market in terms of net carbs and dietary fiber level...plus they taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Yarger

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety here, the only one I don't really care for of all the flavors is the Vanilla almond crunch and that is one that I thought I would enjoy. That being said Strawberry Cheesecakes is the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars. They are very tasty and I like the variety in flavors! The price is also better here on Amazon than in other stores.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Tastes yummy.
customer_reviews.text: These bars are the best tasting that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great and will be on my reorder list.
customer_reviews.author: IceQueen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They just arrived today. Fresh and not smashed. I will order again when ready.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Weston

customer_reviews.title: The flavors are great as usual
customer_reviews.text: The flavors are great as usual, but this batch seems like it was frozen and then put in the heat or something. They are stuck to the inside of the packaging so bad it makes it very hard to get them out of the wrapper.
customer_reviews.author: SarahSue7

customer_reviews.title: Love the variety pack
customer_reviews.text: The Quest bars are delicious! Love the variety pack; however now that I know some contain sucralose and some are made with stevia, I know which ones to re-order.
customer_reviews.author: lovemypit mix

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: Simply my favorite brand of protein bar on the market. The combination of fiber, protein and lower calorie is simply unparalleled. This particular variety pack is sure to have an option for just about everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Panitch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to try all the the flavors and to keep a variety in your cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: The variety pack is the best because it has so many flavors that you never ...
customer_reviews.text: The variety pack is the best because it has so many flavors that you never get sick of them. They came packaged really professionally too!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Langford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and arrived quickly. Would use this sellar again.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Bedosky

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bars came melted to plastic. Not sure if that happened during transportation or not.
customer_reviews.author: Skyhigh Networds

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. Possible non genuine product!
customer_reviews.text: These are no where near the same quality as quest bars. aside from the fact that their squished and shrink wraped instead of loose in a box, They're very dark in color, very hard and don't seem fresh even though they're well within the date printed on the packaging. Due to poor quality and my positive experiences buying Quest bars elsewhere I consider these to be fakes.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful What you order.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful which you order, I thought I was getting a variety pack but instead got three boxes of single flavors. The quest bars themselves are great, but wish I had gotten what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bars were fresh but the shrink wrap compressed the bar ...
customer_reviews.text: Bars were fresh but the shrink wrap compressed the bar and made them difficult to remove from package and eat.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Bars Sometimes Stale
customer_reviews.text: About 1 out of every 2 or 3 times I order the bars from an Amazon seller, the bars are stale in texture.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. McCullohs

customer_reviews.title: These bars are truly disgusting. If you are used to eating fresh foods ...
customer_reviews.text: These bars are truly disgusting. If you are used to eating fresh foods with little or no preservatives, there is no way you will be able to stomach these.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

product_meta.title: Quest Nutrition Quest Protein Bar Variety 36 Pk.
product_meta.description: Includes 3 of each Flavor: Banana Nut Muffin, Peanut Butter&Jelly, Peanut Butter Supreme, Lemon Cream Pie, Mixed Berry Bliss, Coconut Cashew, Strawberry Cheesecake, Chocolate Brownie, Cinnamon Roll, Apple Pie, Vanilla Almond Crunch, Chocolate Peanut Butter. This Quest Bar Sample Box is the perfect pack for anyone looking to get top quality protein while dropping some carbs from their diet. They're as delicious and convenient as a candy bar, while maintaining all of the nutrition of a carefully prepared meal that's packed with fiber to make you feel full and to help with digestion and weight loss.
feature_bullets: No Soy, Gelatin, Cheap Proteins or Trans Fats
